bibl.title: Menander. I. Aspis to Epitrepontes.
bibl.seg: Arnott W. Geoffrey (Edited and Translated by), Menander. I. Aspis to Epitrepontes. (The Loeb Classical Library. 132.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University - Heinemann, 1979, lv-526 pp.

C.R. par D. Bain, GaR 27 (1980) pp. 180-182. - John Blundell, JHS 105 (1985) pp. 190-191. - Fr. Lasserre, AntCl 49 (1980) pp. 336-337. - P.G. McC. Brown, CR N.S., 33 (1983) pp. 180-184 [concerne aussi: Ludwig Koenen, The Cairo Codex of Menander. A photographic edition (London, 1978)]. - H. Thesleff, Arctos 14 (1980) pp. 133-134. - E. Valgiglio, Maia N.S., 33 (1981) pp. 262-263. - W.J. Verdenius, Mnemosyne 4e s., 39 (1986) pp. 170-172. - A. Wankenne, EtCl 48 (1980) p. 363. - R. W[eil], RPhil 3e s., 55 (1981) pp. 160-161.
